item.description:
Hello!

The runner up on the latest poll was The Poisonwood Bible. The usual details: Brugger's Bagels, $1 donation asked for at the meeting.

Feel free to contact me with any questions/comments.

Cheryl
item.how_to_find_us: I will have the book on the table.

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: July Meetup: The Poisonwood Bible by Barbara Kingsolver
